FROM( SELECT h.object_id,h.collect_id FROM hj_user_collect h where h.user_id = #{userId} and y.collect_type = 1 ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT #{pageIndex},#{pageSize} ) as t LEFT JOIN hj_server_info y on t.object_id = y.server_id
